newsitem.title: NETHERLANDS: Sales of Dutch 2007 bond raise NLG 4.7 bln so far.
newsitem.headline: Sales of Dutch 2007 bond raise NLG 4.7 bln so far.

text.p: The Finance Ministry said the government had raised 4.7 billion guilders so far through tap sales of its new 5.75 percent bond due February 2007.
Tap sales began on Monday and will continue daily from 0800 GMT until further notice.
